alert.note: Alert for Cobb; Douglas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 10:03AM EST until January 27 at 11:52AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Sweetwater Creek near Austell affecting Douglas and Cobb Counties. For the Sweetwater Creek...including Powder Springs, Powder Springs, Powder Springs, Austell, Austell, Austell, Sweetwater Creek below Austell...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Sweetwater Creek near Austell. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 12 feet, Minor flooding continues in the woodlands and fields upstream and downstream from the gage near the Interstate 20 bridge. Portions of a paintball playing field just downstream of the bridge and athletic fields in the Woodrow Wilson Park on Mount Vernon Road are flooded with one to two feet of water. A portion of Wren Circle in Douglas County...the County Iron Works and Sunlight Drive in Cobb County begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM EST Friday the stage was 11.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.7 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 10 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1015 PM EST.
